pin_code 1234 App Code When accessing your KEEFREE mobile application.

credit Credit Development information, attributes and credit to authors.
CONNECTED NOT CONNECTED Bluetooth LE not supported! Unfortunately, your device does not support bluetooth low energy (LE).KEEFREE smart bike lock uses bluetooth LE in order to connect.\n\nThis application will now exit… Scanning Error Unable to scan. Please try again later. Cannot find your device Please check if your KEEFREE is turn on and that your in range.
SECURITY OFF Turn Security Off Are you sure you want to turn security off?\nIt will remove theft detection, SMS notification, alarm, etc. SECURITY ON
Location Permission In order to connect your KEEFREE smart bike lock, location permissions is required. Found Devices Connect to your KEEFREE smart bike lock! Please wait… Disconnect Get Directions Connect to KEEFREE Please connect to your KEEFREE smart bike first. Timed Out... Did not receive successful message from your KEEFREE. May need to try again. Unlocking for 5 seconds... OnBoardingActivity Settings\
Skip Next Finish CONNECT Connect to your personal KEEFREE smart bike lock by clicking on the linking icon. Located on top-left of keefree section. SECURITY TRACK Turn security on when you have connected. This activates theft detection, alarms and notifications. Track the location of your KEEFREE smart bike lock! Open Google maps to direct yourself in case you forget! TURN BUZZER OFF
